content: @James Agnew Will HAPI FHIR in a snapshot have support for the new Observation and Device resources? The Device and DeviceComponent have been merged and the DeviceComponent no longer exists? If so, can you tell me what the version is (for gradle + android)? Thanks!

Hi Brian,

We're releasing within the next week or so, so there will be a right up-to-date updated version of the R4 definitions in there.

James,

Thanks for the update. The Device-DeviceComponent merge (as you can imaging) has a HUGE impact on the PHD modelling. It's been a dream to have that for years. Are there any issues remaining with Android?
Also, on an aside, would it be reasonable to submit a Java class for MDC codes to HAPI FHIR so both reader and uploaders could use them?

That sounds awesome- agree, that sounds like a good change.

Are you envisioning like a constants file with the codes in it bundled into HAPI? Certainly I'm not opposed, as long as there aren't copyright issues..
